div.p: This element can be found in WRITING PRODUCTION . It is used to indicate a dedication of a work. It includes name where possible, and sometimes quote; has no mandatory or optional sub-elements or attributes.

div.codeblock: <PDEDICATION>She included a dedication to her 152 subscribers.</PDEDICATION>.
<PDEDICATIONn>HM dedicated the novel in finished form to her companion Jane Harrison.</PDEDICATION>.

div.p: Include this information if you can, especially for earlier periods. You can also tag this way a dedication promised but not implemented. (It was once a practice important in raising funds as well as a statement of emotional connection.)
